templatelistener.name: javascriptInclude
templatelistener.templatecode:
<script>
	{if NODEPUSH_HOST}
	requirejs.config({ map: { '*': { 'Bastelstu.be/Push': 'Bastelstu.be/NodePush' } }
	                 , paths: { 'socket.io': '{@NODEPUSH_HOST|encodeJS}/socket.io/socket.io' }
	                 })
	require([ 'Bastelstu.be/NodePush' ], function (nodePush) {
		nodePush.init('{@NODEPUSH_HOST|encodeJS}', '{$nodePushSignedUserID|encodeJS}')
	})
	{/if}
</script>
